data.description: A story book home is opening up to you with this stunning colonial situated on an acre and a half. This home has so much character and charm in every room. Each room has impeccable touches to detail and is well maintained. Step into the beautiful french country kitchen while entertaining guest on the screened in porch or lower deck while overlooking the creek that runs behind this beautiful home. Upstairs you will find 3 bedrooms and a bath with 2 massive walk in closets in the master. There is a laundry shoot in the floor connected straight to the laundry room. The basement can be used for additional space to be completed or used for storage with a full bath. If you have been looking for peace and quiet in a mature neighborhood, then you have found the one! It truly is a must see and breathtaking in person.
